name: Recency Scoring Works
description: Given two similar-quality episodes, the more recent one should rank higher due to recency decay scoring.

setup.note: Cold start emphasizes quality (60%) and recency (40%), no similarity component

recent.title: Elon Musk on Space GPUs, AI, Optimus, and his manufacturing method

older.title: How Marc Andreessen Actually Uses AI

pass_criteria.description: recency_score for Feb 5 episode > recency_score for Nov 25 episode
In cold start, recent high-quality episode ranks higher than older equivalent-quality episode
Final score for recent episode is higher than older episode

validation_method: Check recency_score values in response, verify ranking order respects recency when quality is similar
notes: The Nov 25 episode is 72 days old, which is within the 90-day window but should have significantly lower recency score. Lambda=0.03 gives ~23 day half-life, so 72 days = ~3 half-lives = recency_score ~0.11
